title: panca bANan
sahitya:
panca bANan tannuDaya vAncanayE sahiyanjnyu nencakam valanjyiDunnu mAmaka mahO


anupallavi

  munjya munjya manam mayi manjya matil vannirunnu 
punciri candrika koNDu sinjya mE mAnasam kAnta


caraNam 1    nANavain veDinjyu nI mata prANanAtha viravODu kANi nEram kaLayate ksINayAmenne 
paNiyODu pANi cErttu prANa rakSa ceydu sUna bANa khOrArttiya tIrttu krINanam ceyka nI melle
    caraNam 2    cApava meDattu mArabhrapa niha vannaDuttu kOpamODe porijnyAsram tApamETTunnu 
rUpa jitamAra nin sallApadhADi kONDu karNa kUpa pUratti ceyka jAta rUpa cEla padmanAbha
